branchCategory.name: 10-V100
branchCategory.description: Series 10-V100 is a compact, light-weight, high flow valve for piloting process valves or actuator applications. SMC's series 10-V100 is one of the most advanced solenoid valves in today’s market. After inspection, products are blown with high purity air (clean bench/class M3.5) in a clean enviroment. Products are sealed and shipped in anti-static double bags.
